text.title: part3_Wikinews interviews Australian Paralympic wheelchair basketballer Shelley Chaplin

p.s: Wow !
Yeah , it 's really exciting .
When is that ?
We go in June .
But next month we 're going to launch a big fund raising campaign to get together all the money to do it all .
But yeah , it 's pretty cool .
Are you still with the basketball ?
Are you going to continue with that ?
Yep ! I do !

So two weeks , no less than two weeks , the fourteenth of January , we go to the AIS for our first training camp of the
Rio
campaign .
So I might be able to catch you guys again there .
From the fourteenth to the seventeenth .
It must have been disappointing in London â€” Let me put it like this :
I 'm watching the game , and it 's " oh no , they 're losing " but you do n't look like you 're losing .
You look like you 're having the time of your life .
Yeah ! Definitely .
I mean , what we play for is to play on the world stage and it is a lot of fun .
Did you see how many people were there was ?
Yeah , it was insane .
In-sane .
I was staring up at the top and I could not see the top rows .
They were completely in darkness .
There was so many people there , and they were all supporting us .
It was so much fun .
It was the best I 've ever done .
But yeah , of course it 's disappointing , because you do n't want to win silver , or lose gold , but ...
The silver 's pretty good !
Yeah , being second in the world 's pretty good , definitely , but silver 's tough .
It 's just that the Gliders have never won .
They 've never won the World Championship , they 've never won at the Paralympics .
We 've never won .
Yeah , so obviously we wanted to change that .
So yeah , definitely disappointing .
We did what we were capable of .
It was n't like we underperformed .
We did n't play badly .
We just were n't quite good enough .
Yeah .

And the
Germans
were very good .
They worked really hard .
Really good .
They were very good , so ...
You played pretty well .
We had patches where we did n't play well , but that 's basketball .
The whole team needed to find something and lift , because like ... we interviewed one of your team mates , and she we ca n't expect to win if we 're shooting 39 per cent .
Then of course you went ahead and won two games shooting 39 per cent , which sort of made a bit of a liar out of her ...
